Line.Text: Are you the one in charge?
They keep telling me that.
As much as it surprises me, I am.
You must be someone really important from LIFE+.
Not really. I’m just a time traveler.
As the current situation stands… I guess you could say so.
Wow. It’s out of my league to even imagine what your life must be like. But you probably want to hear what’s happened.
If you can.
Yes, let’s start from the beginning.

Well, I should probably start with the show. Everything kinda revolved around it.[pause] I was doing a web series with a group of people; mostly as a lead actress, but also editing sometimes and giving other random help here and there. We would film it and upload online for people to watch.[pause] We’ve been going for about 2 years; you could say it was my main occupation.

The beginning is probably the show. Everything kinda revolved around it.[pause] I was doing a web series with a group of people; mostly as a lead actress, but also editing sometimes and giving other random help here and there. We would film it and upload online for people to watch.[pause] We’ve been going for about 2 years; you could say it was my main occupation.
What kind of web series?
Is it popular?
Go on.
Comedy-drama, with some VR effects to make it more engaging.
More or less. Nowhere near the top stars, but enough to have an active and supportive community.
About ten days ago somebody apparently hacked into my account, because I was locked out, and then a blog post appeared under my name that I didn’t write, saying that I was leaving the show for good.
Just suddenly leaving like that? Wasn’t it obvious that it’s not your post?

Oh, no, it was very convincing. Not a single inconsiderate word, but a lot of explanation: what a great ride it was, how much fun I had, but how I feel it’s time to move on.[pause] Future me could’ve written that, after doing this for 5 more years and finally getting tired. Not the present me, though. The present me still enjoyed every single second.
Couldn’t you explain the situation to your fellow show makers? And, through them, to fans?

That’s exactly what I tried to do! I called them, they believed me, and then they tried to explain to people that the post was fake and I wasn’t going anywhere. Some were convinced, but others said I should make up my mind already.[pause] The internet security is so good these days; it’s hard to believe that stuff from your account can be not yours. Or maybe we just weren’t fast enough, and the message already sank in.
Even so, shouldn’t the fans be grateful that you decided to stay?

That’s what I thought. But the negative comments I started to get after finally restoring my account… it was so unexpected and confusing.[pause] People said that I’d really better go, that I look tired and should leave the role to somebody who is more excited about it…
One moment they like you, the next moment they ask you to leave?
What kind of fans is that, forcing a lead actress to quit?
Well… that must’ve been a bummer.

It’s like this story became the tipping point. The disappointment was building up in silence for some time, but then they decided to speak their mind.[pause] I mean, most said they still like the show… they just feel it will be better off without me.
That’s an even meaner thing to say.
That must’ve been tough.
That’s… not a very nice situation to find yourself in.

It’s better this way… I mean, the whole thing is kinda pointless unless viewers enjoy it, right?[pause] I just wish they could’ve said it sooner. I wish I didn’t fool myself into thinking that others like me.[pause] All this time, I felt that I really found my calling. I wanted to entertain people. Only people had different things in mind…
Hey, cheer up. This would not have happened if it wasn’t for a single person, and that person is going to answer for it.
Yeah, people tend to do that.
Thank you. I really appreciate all your help; it’s very important to me.
It’s sad… we do so many wonderful things, but it takes so little to crush them.
I was told you were fired. Is this what they meant?
And you were distressed so much you even considered suicide and blogged about it, right?
Can you tell me about the suspects?
I have more questions about the suspects.
That should be all for now, thank you.
Do you want to know something else?

No, I was fired from my “official” job as well. I worked part-time as a waitress at a small local cafe – well, a fancy small local cafe, you could probably say, as they employ real people to serve clients.[pause] I assume my boss wasn’t happy he no longer had a small-time actress for a waitress, because a couple of days into the incident he called and said I shouldn’t bother coming anymore.
That’s a pretty strange reason to get rid of an employee.
Wasn’t the show bringing you enough money?
I’ve got another question.

A waitress job can get a bit weird, now that most food places rely on automated terminals or robots. If you serve people where a machine could do, smiling and being polite is not enough; you need to be special, to have a “twist.”[pause] I always knew my acting was the main reason he hired me. I just never thought it was the only twist I had.

Sadly, no. We sell some merch here and there, but it’s not generating any significant income yet. I had to work on the side to pay the bills.[pause] To be honest, I’m also a bit wasteful when it comes to spending money… well, no other way but to get rid of that habit now, right?
Sure, I’ll try to answer.
Y-yes, about that…[pause] Oh, God, I don’t know how to say it…[pause] You’re gonna arrest me too…
What’s the problem?
Let me guess… you didn’t really think about it, did you?

I didn’t…[pause] really consider it…[pause] I don’t think I have the guts to kill myself.[pause] I was just really depressed, and didn’t know what to do, and I’ve heard that the government and some corporations monitor and respond to blog posts like that, so…

No…[pause] I don’t think I have the guts to kill myself.[pause] I was just really depressed, and didn’t know what to do, and I’ve heard that the government and some corporations monitor and respond to blog posts like that, so…
Wait, you mean you deliberately tricked everyone? Made them think it’s more serious than it is?
…so you wrote it to attract attention.
…so you thought it would be fun to use them for solving your own problems.

Oh God, I’m so sorry…![pause] I just thought maybe someone would give me a call or something… I never thought it would be this serious![pause] You reacted like it’s a matter of national security. I couldn’t imagine that the most prominent corporation in the world would get involved…[pause] Oh, I’m in trouble, am I?
Yeah, well, I don’t think that’s entirely your fault…
Don’t worry about it. LIFE+ has its own agenda and its own reasons to be here.
Who knows? I’m here just for the bullying part.
I think you should be, but, either way, that comes after we find our culprit.
I hope you’re right… Silly me, imposing on people with such stupid troubles…
I should be punished for this… Silly me, imposing on people with such stupid troubles…
Of course, I work with these people – used to work until recently, I mean… Who do you have in mind?
Sure, I’ll try to answer.
Tell me about Karl.
Tell me about Vivienne.
Tell me about Daniel.
Tell me about Anne.
Tell me about Cloe.
So you think none of them are guilty?
You and Daniel had another incident right before this happened, right?
Do you know why Cloe’s picture is a silhouette of a penguin?
Your Cloe refuses to talk to me.
Let’s change the topic.
Of course, just tell me how I can help.

He’s a nice guy, even when he doesn’t sound like one. Very talented and committed, a perfectionist; I could never pay so much attention to little things.[pause] His acting is flawless, and the occasional episodes he writes always have a unique style. May not be the easiest person to work with, but the troubles are worth it.
Do you think he did this?
Not a chance. He may talk bad about people, but to actually waste effort on bringing them down? Too busy leaving his mark on the world for that kind of thing.

She’s amazing. A constant inspiration to me, really. The way she acts, moves and talks… it’s like she spends her every waking hour on a gigantic stage.[pause] She’s my co-lead; we have roughly equal parts on the show, and I always thought it’s unfair that I get more attention. Well, that’s not a problem anymore…
Do you think she did this?
Of course not. She is completely disinterested in mundane affairs; art is all she lives and breathes. I wish I could do that too… I wish I could disappear in art and forget about all this.

He’s all right. Inconsiderate, sometimes, but that’s not because he doesn’t care about other people; he just doesn’t give it enough thought.[pause] He joined us only recently, and he’s not very committed, but I tried to teach him the basics, and he proved to be a decent learner. I’m sure he can become a great addition to the team.
Do you think he did this?

Unlikely. He can be clueless, it might get unpleasant, but he’ll never hurt others knowingly.[pause] And that resignation post… well, it’s impossible to write something like that without realizing how much real damage it can bring.

She’s my best friend. We’ve been together long before this show started. I kinda dragged her into it… chewed her ear off with talks about how awesome the whole thing was, he-he.[pause] Today, however, it’s impossible to imagine our decorations without her magical treatment, so it was totally worth it. I’m sure she never regrets it as well.
Do you think she did this?

That’s just unthinkable. There is nothing in the world she cares about more than my mental and physical well-being.[pause] When I start to work too hard, she’s always there to look after me and squeeze some fun in. I’m honesty blessed to have such a wonderful friend.

She’s awesome; we’d never had such kind and friendly atmosphere without her. She lives in her own world, but it’s a good kind of world; the kind of world we all should visit more.[pause] She’s our principal writer, and her stories and scripts are just as awesome as she is.
Do you think she did this?

No way, she’s the sweetest person ever.[pause] And even if she wasn’t, she’s still too preoccupied with all those big topics and ideas flowing through her head. She’d probably find this whole business incredibly boring.
Well, yes. I can’t wrap my head around a mere possibility of them doing something like this.
Are you sure?
No disrespect or anything, but this incident may suggest you are prone to suddenly discovering stuff about people.
Well… no. I’m not sure about anything anymore. In fact, you probably shouldn’t listen to me; I would only bring more confusion to the case.
Yeah, you’re right. You probably shouldn’t give my opinion much credit. You’re in a better position to figure this out.
Then who do you think it was?
I don’t have the slightest idea. I’m really sorry I can’t be of any real help. I feel so useless.

More like a misunderstanding than an incident, really. I wouldn’t say we were closer than anybody else working on the show… but one day, he asked me out.[pause] I didn’t want to be in a relationship just yet, so I tried to say “no” in the politest way possible… but he wasn’t satisfied, and he kept trying.[pause] Then it got awkward. Then I might have said “no” in a less polite way… then this whole thing happened.
But you still don’t think he did it.

I don’t know… it could have been bad timing, right? It’s true that the conversation wasn’t smooth, but it’s also true that he tried to apologize the same evening.[pause] Besides, he never struck me as someone who can take his grudge this far. No, that would be too… out of character.
Because she insists to be one.
To be a penguin? Or to be a silhouette of a penguin?
How is that possible? You’ve met her in person, right? Doesn’t she look human?
Eh… right.
I… don’t think she’s ever specified.
Well, yeah. But you can never know for sure, right?
Do you want to know something else?
Impossible. Nobody enjoys thoughtful conversations more than Cloe.
I mean, she speaks… but she only says nonsense.
Yeah, “thoughtful” is not exactly how I would describe it…
Oh, that’s just how Cloe is. She doesn’t discern between nonsensical and ingenious.
Hey, about that unexpected reaction from your fans…
It wasn’t only hate, right?
No, some were really supportive. They told me not to listen to haters; said they’re not even real fans.[pause] But it was so few and far between… the negativity was overwhelming.
Ashley, those folks were spot on. Your haters are not real fans. They’re not even real people!
What if I tell you that the entire backlash was actually coming from one place?
What do you mean?
They’re fake accounts. A hacker created them; the same person who wrote that resignation and posted it on your blog.
I mean that one person impersonated many. Created dozens of fake accounts and made it look massive and predominant, when in fact it was not.
But how’s that possible? You can’t just create another account, let alone so many; no more than you can make another identity card…

You can if you know how to break the security. Your attacker is a computer criminal, and a very capable one. But we managed to track the negative comments down to a single source. They’re definitely the work of one guy.
And that guy wrote them because…

…because that was his plan from the start! He knew one post couldn’t change anything. Your own writing or not, these things are eventually accepted and forgotten. No, the trick was to make it seem as if people honestly want you to go. He never intended to fool the fans. He intended to fool you.

…because that was his plan from the very beginning. He knew one post couldn’t change anything. Your own writing or not, these things are eventually accepted and forgotten. No, the trick was to make it seem as if people honestly want you to go. He never intended to fool the fans. He intended to fool you.
Wow. I never even suspected…[pause] that…[pause] that changes quite a lot, isn’t it?
It does! Your viewers like you, Ashley, and no bully in the world can erase it.
I hope it can lift your spirits, at the very least, because your spirit was the real target here.
I… thank you. Does that mean you found the hacker as well?
Shawn is tracking him down as we speak. Shouldn’t take too long.
No, but if Shawn can do his work, that will be rectified shortly.
You really are a miracle worker. Thank you so much.
Don’t thank me yet. It’s not over, but it will be soon.
Just doing my part, since I got dragged into this anyway.
Well, Ashley, the case is closed. The criminal is successfully tracked down and arrested. I even talked to him.
Just wanted you to know that our job is done. We found the hacker and gave him the full treatment. Quite a character he turned out to be…
Hold on for a moment.
Is it someone I know?
No, just a stranger. A stranger who watched you from afar and planned his scheme.
I don’t think so, but you can confirm it later with Shawn to be sure.
Did he mention any reason for doing all this?
Not exactly, but it was written all over him. He’s a bitter man, envious of your work, your connection with fans and the joy it brings to everybody.
No, I don’t think he needed one. He was driven by emotions… and not the good type of emotions either.
His kind has only one reason: causing people pain and reveling in it. It’s the only way they know.
That’s… that’s sad.
Maybe, but it’s not you who should be sad anymore. You can go back to doing what you love the most. You can return to your calling.
Don’t waste your empathy on this person; he spent enough time feeding on your emotions as it is. The important thing is that it’s over.
Yeah, you’re right. It’s strange… I still feel kinda useless and inappropriate.[pause] I mean, you literally gave me back my life, and I don’t even know how to react.
That’s normal, you need time to heal. But you won’t have to do it alone. Anne and the others are still your friends.
That’s normal, you need time to heal. But you won’t have to do it alone. Anne and the others are still your friends. Shawn will be available too, in case you need more professional help.
React however you want, really. My work is finished. The rest you’ll have to figure out by yourself.
And Daniel? What happens to him?
He will be left to his own devices. You are free to pursue any kind of relationship… or lack thereof.
What do you think I should do?
You should do what you wanted to do. Trust your feelings, Ashley.
I think you should give him a chance. He honestly likes you… he’s just very bad at showing his feelings.
He’s egotistical and stupid, but I think he means no harm. Take it as you like.
Stay away from him. He’s an infantile loser, even if he wasn’t our culprit. You deserve better.
Thank you. It’s so hard to sort your own feelings out, let alone the feelings of others…[pause] but we have to keep trying, right?
Thank you, I’ll do that. I promised myself to value the things I have.[pause] Funny, isn’t it? All these years of coexistence and cooperation, and we’re still so bad at understanding each other…
Thank you, I think I understand him a little better now. It’s so hard to understand people…[pause] but we have to keep trying, right?
Thank you for the warning. I guess that’s all we can do with bad people…[pause] ignore and stay away.
And one more thing…

Don’t let this incident derail your faith in humanity. Because here’s the thing, Ashley: I trust people too. I trusted your friends, and I trusted you that none of them would do this. And in the end, that led us to truth. So don’t you stop doing that. No matter how bad it can burn you sometimes, don’t stop believing in people.

You should be more careful with others. Some just can’t be trusted. They may try to use you, or even hurt you. So keep your guard up. Maybe you won’t need it one day… but not today. The world is not there yet.

No disrespect, but try to fix your gullible attitude a little. The world can be much more hostile and dangerous than you imagine. I’d hate to see it take advantage of a pure and earnest person like you.
T-Thank you. You did so much for me… I’ll be sure to remember that.
Well, Ashley, the case is closed. The culprit is apprehended.
Just wanted you to know that our job here is done. The offender’s been arrested.
Never mind.
Was it really someone from the team?
Yes, it was Karl. His motive is solid.
Yes, it was Vivienne. Her motive is solid.
Yes, it was Daniel. His motive is solid.
Yes, it was Anne. Her motive is solid.
But… I don’t understand at all. Why would he do something like that?
He was jealous of your connection with fans. He’s the kind of person who talks high and mighty but feels small and insecure.
He’s too arrogant to accept that you were the MVP in the team, not him. He couldn’t allow you to steal the spotlight.
I… I can’t wrap my head around it. Why would she do something like that?
She has her own problems. There is a dangerous emptiness hidden beneath all those exuberant personalities.
She couldn’t deal with you being the star of the show. The only reason she do what she does is her desperate need for attention.
So it was him after all? I can’t believe it… why would he go so far?
I’m not sure he realized how far it was. He’s impulsive and ignorant, which is a dangerous mix.
Because he’s a stupid egotistic boy, that’s why. A kind of person who hurts others without giving it any thought.
That is insane. I can’t… I can’t even comprehend it. Why would she do something like that?
I don’t think she meant any harm. She was so fixated on protecting you from every little thing, it clouded her judgment. She started to treat you as a project, not as a friend.

I’m afraid her feelings toward you turned into something toxic. She was uncomfortable when you found a whole bunch of other people to hang out with, so she tried to change it… maybe without realizing the consequences.
People hide all kinds of dark feelings deep inside. Sometimes these feelings take control.
That’s… that’s sad.
Maybe, but it’s not you who should be sad anymore. You’ve had more than enough of that already.
Don’t waste your empathy on this person. The important thing is that it’s over.
But… what about the team? Will this be the end to our show?
Not necessarily. The others are still your friends, right? You can still make it work. And if you do, your bond will be stronger than ever before.

Maybe, but it doesn’t mean you have to stop doing what you love. You can join another show, or start your own, or explore acting in different mediums. Opportunities are endless, as long as you don’t give up.
Forget about the show. These people don’t deserve to be on your team. You can do so much better.
I have no idea, but I think you should stop moping around. Whatever happens, it’s not the end of the world.
Thank you for your kind words. It’s like we’re being tested, right…? I need to pull myself together and do everything I can.
Thank you for your kind words. It’s like I’m being tested, right…? I have to pull myself together and do the best I can.
You’re probably right. I need to stop looking back and start looking forward… as hard and scary as it might be.
